name: XCSourceEditorCommand
desc: The protocol you implement to handle command invocations in a source editor extension.

items.name: struct XCSourceEditorCommandDefinitionKey
items.desc: A key in the dictionary that defines a source editor command.

items.name: func perform(with: XCSourceEditorCommandInvocation, completionHandler: (Error?) -> Void)
items.desc: Performs the action associated with the command using the information in an invocation.
